TopicTitle: KSP2 needs a Suggestions and Devlopemt tab already!!!!!

Articles.Content:
I suggested this early that KSP2 needed a Suggestions and Development tab on the KSP Forums. As you may see a surprisingly more amount of forum members are posting suggestions and idea for KSP2 developments.  I personally think its a good time to make  suggestions and development tab before there are way too many suggestions to even sort. And the thread could all get mixed up being disorganized.

Edited April 30, 2023 by Dr. Kerbal
We got it! We got the tab!
